meanings.definition: Covered in a sticky or messy substance.
meanings.sent1: The gaumy candy wrapper stuck to my fingers.
meanings.sent2: Her hands were gaumy after playing with the slime.
meanings.sent3: The gaumy glue made it challenging to separate the papers.
meanings.sent4: The gaumy mud clung to his shoes like a second skin.
meanings.sent5: The gaumy syrup dripped slowly down the side of the jar.

meanings.definition: To smear or cover with a sticky or messy substance.
meanings.sent1: She accidentally gaumied her hair with the sticky tape.
meanings.sent2: The toddler gaumied the walls with his chocolate-covered hands.
meanings.sent3: He gaumied the sandwich with an excessive amount of mayo.
meanings.sent4: The painter gaumied the canvas with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The chef gaumied the dish with a drizzle of honey.
